      • joinChatRoom

        public boolean joinChatRoom(IChatRoom chatRoom)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        User joins a chatRoom. This method only add the chatRoom into user's chatRoom set.
        Parameters:
        chatRoom - - the chatRoom the user want to join.
        Returns:
        return false if the chatRoom already in the user's chatRoom list.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a network error occurs.

      • exitChatRoom

        public boolean exitChatRoom(IChatRoom chatRoom)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        User exits a chatRoom. This method only remove the chatRoom into user's chatRoom set.
        Parameters:
        chatRoom - - the chatRoom the user want to exit.
        Returns:
        return false if the chatRoom not in the user's chatRoom list.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a network error occurs.
